Finally we did it!

Thank you pumpsoul, but I have to say something.

We were here for days and you come several times per day giving us a few bytes, and then went. 

I can understand that you have no technical possibilities to be a real seeder, but you had to think about that before you uploaded the 28 GB large game. 

There were 30-40 peers waiting for hte last  1.5% of the game. The problem is, also that noone of them is still here to help seeding for other people. I will stay seeding for a few days, but my connection is also not good enough for fast downloading.

Pumpsoul, please, do not upload torrents anymore if you don't have possibilities to support it with seeding.

Best regards

@ zaigrani
